    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    angryState
    The angryState class represents the pet being angry.
    Animal
    The Animal interface represents a virtual pet with basic decay attributes that affect its well-being over time.
    Axolotl
    The Axolotl class is an implementation of the Animal interface that represents a specific type of virtual pet.
    Carrot
    Carrot food item object to be fed to the pet.
    Commands
    The Commands class handles all player interactions with a pet.
    CommandType
    The CommandType class defines constants representing different command actions a player can perform on their pet.
    Coral
    Coral gift item object to be given to the pet.
    deadState
    The deadState class represents the pet being dead.
    DecorItem
    Decor Item parent object.
    defaultState
    The defaultState class represents the normal state of the pet.
    Fish
    Fish food item object to be fed to the pet.
    FoodItem
    Food Item parent object.
    GameDriver
     
    GameInstance
    Game Instance

    The game instance object stores all relevant information necessary for loading or creating a new game save.
    GiftItem
    Gift Item parent object.
    hungryState
    The hungryState class represents the pet being in a hungry condition.
    Inventory
    Player Inventory.
    Item
    Item interface.
    MessageInBottle
    MessageInBottle gift item object to be given to the pet.
    parentalControls
    A class representing the parental control menu.
    Pearl
    Pearl gift item object to be given to the pet.
    Pet
    The Pet class defines a virtual pet's core data and behavior.
    PineappleHouse
    PineappleHouse decor item object to be equipped in the player's tank.
    Pufferfish
    The Pufferfish class is an implementation of the Animal interface that represents a specific type of virtual pet.
    Sandcastle
    Sandcastle decor item object to be equipped in the player's tank.
    save
    Class that represents a save file and the data contained within it.
    saveManager
    A class to manage save files by doing read/write operations on them.
    Shark
    The Shark class is an implementation of the Animal interface that represents a specific type of virtual pet.
    Shop
    Shop for items.
    Shrimp
    Shrimp food item object to be fed to the pet.
    sleepState
    The sleepState class represents the pet being asleep.
    SoundManager
    Sound Manager

    The game instance object stores all relevant information necessary for loading or creating a new game save.
    sprite
     
    State
    The State interface defines the behavioral contract for all mood-based states that a pet can be in (e.g., Sleep, Angry, Hungry, Dead).
    StatType
    The StatType class defines constant integer values representing different types of pet statistics such as health, hunger, sleep, and happiness.
    TestCommands
     
    TreasureChest
    TreasureChest decor item object to be equipped in the player's tank.
